about_the_game:
Trapped within a long-forgotten temple on the lost continent of Mu, you find yourself surrounded by enigmatic symbols and the sound of ancient mechanisms.

The temple is a labyrinth of deadly puzzles and traps, only a mysterious scarab amulet can help you survive and explore to find a way out.

Is escape your only goal, or is there a deeper mystery waiting to be uncovered?

  • Explore the enigmatic Temple of Mu filled with immersive mechanisms and puzzles.
  • Harness the Power of the Scarab Amulet: Experience a unique death mechanic where you control a scarab to resurrect at altars scattered throughout the temple, turning each setback into an opportunity for further exploration.
  • Discover the forgotten history of the temple as you delve deeper into its hidden chambers designed by the people of Mu, common origin of the great civilizations of Egypt, Greece, Central America and India.

Is escape your only goal, or is there a deeper mystery waiting to be uncovered?

  • Explore the enigmatic Temple of Mu filled with immersive mechanisms and puzzles.
  • Harness the Power of the Scarab Amulet: Experience a unique death mechanic where you control a scarab to resurrect at altars scattered throughout the temple, turning each setback into an opportunity for further exploration.
  • Discover the forgotten history of the temple as you delve deeper into its hidden chambers designed by the people of Mu, common origin of the great civilizations of Egypt, Greece, Central America and India.
name: Escape from Mu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700/Intel i7-6700K or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 56, Nvidia GTX 1070/GTX1660Ti or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore a lost temple full of ancient mechanisms to avoid traps and solve puzzles. The Scarab Amulet holds the power of the lost civilization of Mu, and your only possibility of escaping a certain death.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
